attributes.action: I want you to make it so there are more flood lights in whaley bridge, high peak
attributes.background: I want it so are local government of the high peak Robert Largan makes it so there are more flood lights in whaley bridge as when it gets dark it is very hard to navigate yourself around whaley bridge

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about street lighting are a matter for your local authority, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them, by entering your post code here: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
